39  class xml_archive : public archive {
40  public:
41 
42  xml_archive() {
43  done();
44  }
45 
46  ~xml_archive() {
47  done();
48  }

55  void open(std::string file_name, opening_mode mode);
56 
63  void init(std::string file_name, bool loading);
64 
68  void close() {
69  return done();
70  }
71 
76  void done() {
77  archive::init();
78 
79  m_pCurElement = NULL;
80  m_nTab = 0;
81  m_vPointerstored.clear();
82 
83  if (m_oOut.is_open()) {
84  m_oOut << "</archive>" << endl;
85  m_oOut.close();
86  }
87 
88  m_oParser.close();
89 
90  if (m_dBranches.size() != 0) throw new eternity::exception("enter_branch()/leave_current_branch() or make_branch()/leave_current_branch() mismatch");
91 
92  }

149 
150  template <class T>
151  void xml_archive::write(std::string key, T value) {
152  if (is_loading()) throw eternity::exception("write attempt on an archive open for loading.");
153  formatting();
154  m_oOut << "<" << key << ">";
155  m_oOut << value;
156  m_oOut << "</" << key << ">" << endl;
157  }
158 
160 
161  template<class t>
162  t* xml_archive::get_object(std::string key, t** ppObj, int pos) {
163  std::string cls_name;
164  *ppObj = NULL;
165  node* m_pPrevElement;
166 
167  //Save current XML element before move to the next one
168  m_pPrevElement = m_pCurElement;
169  m_pCurElement = m_pCurElement->foundChild(key, pos);
170 
171  cls_name = m_pCurElement->attributes["class"];
172  //cls_name=read("Name", 0) ;
173 
174  //Template use <> to pass argument but XML use the
175  //same symbols to open/close tags: we have to change
176  //them before use this kind of persistence
177  replace(cls_name.begin(), cls_name.end(), '(', '<');
178  replace(cls_name.begin(), cls_name.end(), ')', '>');
179 
180  //RTTI return the class name with the string
181  //"class " before: so if cls_name.length()>5
182  //it is a valid name. Otherwise it is a pointer
183  //to an object loaded yet.
184  if (!cls_name.empty()) {
185  create(cls_name, ppObj);
186 
187  if (NULL != (*ppObj)) {
188  m_vPointerstored.push_back(*ppObj);
189  (*ppObj)->xml_serialize(*this);
190  }
191  } else {
192  int pos = atoi(m_pCurElement->attributes["position"].c_str());
193  //read("Position", pos, 0);
194 
195  if (pos>-1) *ppObj = static_cast<t*> (m_vPointerstored[pos]);
196  }
197 
198  //Restore parent XML element
199  m_pCurElement = m_pPrevElement;
200  return *ppObj;
201  }
202 
204 
205  template <class t>
206  t* xml_archive::put_object(std::string key, t* pObj) {
207  int pos = put_pointer(pObj);
208 
209  if (pos == -1) {
210  //New Object, we have to full serialize it
211  std::string buf = get_conventional_name(typeid (*pObj).name());
212  if (buf.empty()) buf = typeid (*pObj).name();
213 
214  //Template use <> to pass argument but XML use the
215  //same symbols to open/close tags: we have to change
216  //them before use this kind of persistence
217  replace(buf.begin(), buf.end(), '<', '(');
218  replace(buf.begin(), buf.end(), '>', ')');
219 
220  formatting();
221  m_oOut << "<" << key << " class=\"" << buf << "\">" << endl;
222 
223  m_nTab++;
224 
225  //std::string key="Name";
226  //write(key, buf);
227 
228  pObj->xml_serialize(*this);
229  m_nTab--;
230  formatting();
231  m_oOut << "</" << key << ">" << endl;
232  } else {
233  //Object in list, yet. Only store position
234  std::string buf = "NULL";
235 
236  m_oOut << "<" << key << " position=\"" << pos << "\" />" << endl;
237  m_nTab++;
238 
239  //std::string key="Name";
240  //write(key, buf);
241 
242  //buf="Position";
243  //write(buf, pos);
244 
245  m_nTab--;
246  //m_oOut << "</" << key << ">" << endl;
247  }
248  return pObj;
249  }
250 
252 
253  template<class t>
254  void xml_archive::get_stack_object(std::string key, t& Obj, int pos) {
255  node* m_pPrevElement;
256 
257  //Save current XML element before move to the next one
258  m_pPrevElement = m_pCurElement;
259  m_pCurElement = m_pCurElement->foundChild(key, pos);
260 
261  Obj.xml_serialize(*this);
262 
263 
264  //Restore parent XML element
265  m_pCurElement = m_pPrevElement;
266 
267  }
268 
270 
271  template <class t>
272  void xml_archive::put_stack_object(std::string key, t& Obj) {
273  formatting();
274  m_oOut << "<" << key << ">" << endl;
275 
276  m_nTab++;
277  Obj.xml_serialize(*this);
278  m_nTab--;
279  formatting();
280  m_oOut << "</" << key << ">" << endl;
281 
282 
283  }
284 
285 }
